# Atropos Theme

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of this library is to provide a centralized repository to create graphs in the style of Atropos Health for deliverables.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `atropos` like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("atroposhealth/ratropostheme")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_atropos()
```
